reviews.review_msg: This class is well taught, he goes over everything and makes sure you understand it. Also Tony has review classes which he  basically gives you 2 or 3 of the short answer questions which will be on the midterms. I would recommend this course and not perception!!! the TA however does not reply to emails often so if you need help email tony!
Couldn't explain his way out of a cardboard box!!! My god man!! You make the most simple concepts ridiculously confusing. It is so bad that i visited this website for the first time!

I have found this class to be incredibly difficult. Very hard marker on tests. Doesn't have a structured marking system. He tries to explain the course content clearly, but that is not always the case. Someone with a background in physics and physiology may find this class to be much easier than I have.

Good Prof. Class size was small (around 18 students) so encouraged questions and participation. Helpful demonstrations and diagrams. Review sessions that went over everything for the written part of the exam. High class average. Very nice and helpful. Really wants students to do well and to improve as a prof. Highly recommend this course and prof.
